divs: Sighting DetailsDriving toward Longmont, CO, from Boulder, CO on Hwy 119 shortly after 6pm, saw a bright starlike object in the sky. At first I thought it was a star, but it seemed too close to be a star. While I was watching, 2 more star-like objects seemed to come from the first, to form a triangular formation. Then 2 more formed directly under these 2. These 5 bright "stars" held formation for what seemed to be about 5 minutes, and then all disappeared simultaneously, like someone had turned off a light switch.
Summary: appearance of bright starlike objects in formation, sudden disappearance
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Longmont
There were 3 other sightings in Longmont on or around November 10th 2009
